title: Wolverine: First Class - The Rookie (Trade Paperback)
description:
Return with us again to the early days of the all-new, all-different, X-Men for all-new solo adventures of Wolverine and Kitty
Pryde! The next generation of students has arrived at Xavier's School—Colossus, Storm, Nightcrawler, and the mysterious
Wolverine — and with them, new teaching methods. Professor X pairs up green recruit Kitty Pryde with the been-everywhere, done-everything vet Logan — and neither of them is all that happy about it. Collecting WOLVERINE: FIRST CLASS #1-4, plus Wolverine’s first appearance from INCREDIBLE HULK #181.
Rated A …$12.99
ISBN: 978-0-7851-3316-2
